PropellerTerminal Class Reference

The PropellerTerminal class implements a minimal reference implementation of a PropellerManager-based terminal. More...

#include <propellerterminal.h>

Detailed Description

The PropellerTerminal class implements a minimal reference implementation of a PropellerManager-based terminal.

Usage is easy; create an instance of PropellerTerminal and it will set up an event loop. Exit with Ctrl+C.

Examples:
terminal/main.cpp.
